response.overview: Sofia, a girl bitten by a snake, is rushed by locals to the village's esteemed traditional healers, renowned for their expertise in tantric rituals and poison treatment. Upon examining Sofia, the chief tantric, Unnikrishnan Nambhoothiri is dismayed, declaring her situation hopeless due to severe poisoning. However, his son Yadhu steps forward, willing to take on the challenge. Through tireless therapeutic efforts, Yadhu manages to revive Sofia, slowly bringing her back to consciousness. Tragically, as Sofia awakens, Yadhu's intentions take a dark turn. Overcome with lust, he forcibly subdues the half-conscious girl. When Sofia finally regains full consciousness, she realizes the horrific deception. Humiliated and traumatized, she vows to exact revenge in her own way, setting the story for a gripping tale of mysticism, trauma, and retribution, unfolding against the rich backdrop of rural traditions and rituals.
response.title: Randaam Yaamam
